intro: Minuartia gerardi, commonly known as the rock lettuce, is a low-growing, mat-forming plant native to rocky and arid environments. It belongs to the family Montiaceae and is characterized by its small, fleshy, spoon-shaped leaves that are often covered in a powdery coating.
